name: RGB (yanniboi)
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play a game and suddenly be colour blind? Well now you can find out.

RGB is a simple clicking game. You have 3 buttons. Click them in the right order:

Red -> Green -> Blue

Get extra time for correct clicking and lose time when you get it wrong. See how long before the timer gets you. And if you think this game is too easy? Why not try a different colour palette and find out what you've really got!?

Have fun!
